public static class EventBus.Builder

      • newRegistry

      • injectEnricher

        public void injectEnricher(EventEnricher enricher)
        Sets a custom Enricher for events posted to the EventBus which is being built.

        If the Enricher is not set, the enrichments will NOT be supported for the EventBus instance built.

        Parameters:
        enricher - the Enricher for events or null if enrichment is not supported

      • enricher

        public java.util.Optional<EventEnricher> enricher()
        Obtains Enricher assigned to the bus to be built.

        Obtains StreamObserver assigned to the bus.

      • build

        @CheckReturnValue
public EventBus build()
        Builds an instance of EventBus.

        This method is supposed to be called internally when building an enclosing BoundedContext.

        Specified by:
        build in class BusBuilder<EventBus.Builder,io.spine.core.Event,EventEnvelope,EventClass,EventDispatcher>
